definition: to play with fire and get burnt (idiom); fig. to play with evil and suffer the consequences/to get one's fingers burnt

sentences.english: The Cheng Nan-jung self-immolation incident is a watershed in Taiwan's political movement.
sentences.chinese: 鄭南榕的自焚事件，是臺灣政治運動的分水嶺。

sentences.english: He closed the discussion with the remark that "he who plays with fire gets burnt".
sentences.chinese: 他以“玩火者必自焚”這麼一句話結束了討論。

sentences.english: His partner, reportedly hounded by the police, attempted self-immolation.
sentences.chinese: 他的戀人，據說因受到警方的騷擾，曾企圖自焚。

sentences.english: If Gibson fails to keep a check on his temper, he could end up burnt at the stake.
sentences.chinese: 如果吉普森沒忍住他的火爆脾氣，那他將燃火自焚。

sentences.english: He chose to protest by way of self-immolation.
sentences.chinese: 他選擇通過自焚來表示抗爭。

sentences.english: He then lit himself and became a fireball.
sentences.chinese: 接着他就引火自焚變成火球。

sentences.english: Gaby: Playing with fire, almost getting burned but not quite.
sentences.chinese: 玩火幾乎自焚，但卻又不完全是。

sentences.english: You put best into it , the careful ignition immolated oneself.
sentences.chinese: 你好自爲子吧，小心引火自焚了。

sentences.english: Then I should be an ancient Hindu, and burn myself on your pyre.
sentences.chinese: 那麼我就作一個古印度人，在你的火葬堆上自焚。

sentences.english: This is fire we are playing with.
The result will be very serious and I really hope that they would stop playing with fire.
sentences.chinese: 後果將十分嚴重，我真心希望他們停止玩火自焚。

sentences.english: Rosicky got the thistles raked up, but did not stop to burn them.
sentences.chinese: 羅西基得到了荊棘傾斜了，但沒有停下來玩火自焚。

sentences.english: "When they think there is no other option, they burn themselves, " she says.
sentences.chinese: 在覺得沒有其它選擇的時候，她們選擇自焚。

sentences.english: They should learn a lesson from this incident :he who plays with fire will surely get burnt.
sentences.chinese: 他們應從這件事中吸取教訓，玩火者必自焚。

sentences.english: They should learn something from the matter, and somebody who plays with fire will get burnt.
sentences.chinese: 他們應從這件事中吸取教訓，玩火者必自焚。

sentences.english: Legends of people of committing the act of self-immolation date back centuries.
sentences.chinese: 傳說中犯下的自焚行爲可以追溯到幾個世紀的人。

definition: to kill oneself/to commit suicide/to attempt suicide
to set on fire/to commit arson
to set on fire/to commit arson/to create a disturbance
to set fire to/to burn down/burning hot/baked cake
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown
to be buried with the dead/to die for a cause
to burn down/to destroy with fire
to die together in the name of love/to sacrifice oneself for love
